achievements.title: Signed the Contract
achievements.desc: Became a magical girl and started saving the world, step by step.

achievements.title: Magic Is My Middle Name
achievements.desc: Transformed into a magical girl: level two. In the name of the Moon, I will punish you!

achievements.title: Too Magical to Comprehend
achievements.desc: Watched so many mahou shoujo anime that you sparkle occasionally.

achievements.title: Are You a Wizard
achievements.desc: All limiters removed. You can call yourself a god, a wizard, or whatever you wish. You set the rules.
